Method Detail

createXmlParser

public static org.xml.sax.XMLReader createXmlParser(boolean validate,
                                                    boolean disableDoctypes,
                                                    boolean secureLoading)
                                             throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
create our XML parser. We are relying on xerces here, and will fail if it is not found.

Parameters:
validate - flag to turn validation on
disableDoctypes - flag to disable doctypes
secureLoading - flag for secure loading (disables entity expansion)
Returns:
an appropriately configured XML reader
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

setFeatures

public static void setFeatures(org.xml.sax.XMLReader parser,
                               boolean secureLoading,
                               boolean validate,
                               boolean disableDoctypes)
Set a featurel on the parser

Parameters:
parser - parser
secureLoading - whether secure loading should be supported
validate - whether validation is needed
disableDoctypes - whether doc types are allowed

enableXmlSchema

public static void enableXmlSchema(org.xml.sax.XMLReader parser)
turn XSD support on

Parameters:
parser - parser

createBaseXercesInstance

public static org.xml.sax.XMLReader createBaseXercesInstance()
                                                      throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
create a parser. Look first for xerces, then for the sun version

Returns:
a copy of Xerces or other parsser
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - if no implementation could be loaded

setFeature

public static void setFeature(org.xml.sax.XMLReader parser,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              boolean flag)
set a feature on a parser, log any failure but continue. This helps us to get past variants in xerces version on the classpath

Parameters:
parser - parser instance
name - feature name
flag - flag to set/reset

loadDomImplementation

public static org.w3c.dom.DOMImplementation loadDomImplementation()
                                                           throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
use the JAXP APIs to locate and bind to a parser

Returns:
a DOM runtime
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
